name: Blast Be Fast
description:
It meant to be played on windows phone platform but Microsoft shut down its platform in 2017

Blast Be Fast is an addictive and FREE match-3 puzzle game on a circular board with RPG fun!

Unlike most match-3 games, you can rotate marbles on circular board. Match three or more marbles to form a chain to attack your enemies, make and pop biggest chains to blast devastating attacks.

Go on a journey around a universe to discover its secrets. Level-up your character skills, learn new spells, collect most advanced weapons and shields as in classical RPG, to stand against most dangerous monsters in the universe.

Features:

match-3 on circular board;  
RPG like character level-ups;  
collect and improve all of 100+ Weapons, shields and spells;  
play for one of the 5 characters;
